Html:
I've created a fork of this project that has been updated for 2008 R2 over at:

http://intview2.codeplex.com

I loaded the revised version (SQL 2008R2 version) and within a short time recieved and unhandled exception.  I have SQL 2008R2 with SP2 on Windows 7 Pro (32 Bit).

I was connected to a remote database on Windows 2008R2 with SQL 2008R2 SP2 EE.
